reviews.text:
TapOut Craft Beer ‚Äì Great Vibes, Bold Flavours & A Smooth Surprise!

As someone who doesn‚Äôt usually drink, I was pleasantly surprised by TapOut‚Äôs craft beer selection, especially ‚ÄúFalse Sense of Security‚Äù, a fruity, smooth, and easy-to-drink beer that even non-drinkers like me can enjoy. It‚Äôs light, refreshing, and a great intro to craft beer. I‚Äôll definitely be trying more beers in the future!

The food is equally satisfying. The trio beef patty burger is hearty and perfect for sharing with friends. The skewers are well-seasoned, the fried cauliflower is a must-try, and portions are generous. Only minor note, the fish and chips batter was a bit salty for me, but that didn‚Äôt take away from the overall experience.

With its chill atmosphere and solid menu, TapOut is a great spot to hang out, eat well, and explore the world of craft beer, whether you‚Äôre a regular or just getting started.

The bartender let me try two sour on tap, can't decide which to order, I ordered both. Both are so good!! üòä Food is fantastic, calamari, skewers and truffle fries, all yummy üòã!!! I don't stay this area, but I will be back for sure.

Dropped by this place that played pretty old school rock hits and had a great time when it came to their series of craft beers which were pretty fantastic!

Staff were also very helpful to guide us on drinks that will fit into our current palette.

Cozy venue with also good light bites that paired well with the large array of craft beers.

Definitely will come back again if near the area.

I love the atmosphere here - it‚Äôs a very American style bar. The beer is delicious üòã They have a variety of different style of beers from different countries. The service is attentive and welcomed us really well. If you love to try different beers, then this is your next to go spot

This is one of the best takeout gourmet Cheeseburger we‚Äôve ever received. Packaged and delivered with care, arrived warm and perfectly structured. Lovely juicy patty. Awesome toasted buns. Not mushy or messy. Fresh greens. Super airy crispy chunky fries. Absolutely love it. Damn shiok.
